properties.name: id
properties.label: Field ID
properties.description: Unique identifier for this field. The selected farmer value will be stored in this field.

properties.name: storeValue
properties.label: Value to Store
properties.description: Which farmer identifier to save in the form field

properties.name: label
properties.label: Label
properties.description: Display label for the search field

properties.name: displayMode
properties.label: Display Mode
properties.description: How to display the search dialog

properties.name: displayColumns
properties.label: Display Columns
properties.description: Columns to show in search results (comma-separated). Available: nationalId, firstName, lastName, gender, dateOfBirth, phone, district, village, communityCouncil, cooperative

properties.name: showRecentFarmers
properties.label: Show Recent Farmers
properties.description: Show quick-access list of recently selected farmers (Phase 6 feature)

properties.name: maxRecentFarmers
properties.label: Max Recent Farmers
properties.description: Maximum number of recent farmers to show (1-10)

properties.name: apiEndpoint
properties.label: API Base URL
properties.description: Base URL for the Farmer Search API (e.g., /jw/api/fss). This should match your API Builder configuration.

properties.name: apiId
properties.label: API ID
properties.description: API ID for authentication (from API Builder). Required for API access.

properties.name: apiKey
properties.label: API Key
properties.description: API Key for authentication. Keep this secure.

properties.name: nationalIdPattern
properties.label: National ID Pattern (Regex)
properties.description: Regular expression to match national ID format. Default: ^\d{9,13}$ (9-13 digits). Use ^\d{4,}$ for testing with short IDs.

properties.name: nationalIdMinLength
properties.label: National ID Min Length
properties.description: Minimum digits to detect as national ID (before pattern match). Default: 4

properties.name: phonePattern
properties.label: Phone Pattern (Regex)
properties.description: Regular expression to match phone format. Default: ^\+?\d{8,}$ (8+ digits, optional + prefix)

properties.name: phoneMinLength
properties.label: Phone Min Length
properties.description: Minimum digits to detect as phone number. Default: 8

properties.name: autoSelectSingleResult
properties.label: Auto-Select Single Result
properties.description: When search returns exactly one result with high confidence, automatically select it without requiring user click.

properties.name: autoSelectMinScore
properties.label: Auto-Select Min Score
properties.description: Minimum relevance score (0-100) required for auto-selection. Default: 90

properties.name: showAutoSelectNotification
properties.label: Show Auto-Select Notification
properties.description: Show brief notification when farmer is auto-selected
